alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 25 at 6:08PM MST until July 25 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 800 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 608 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Three Points. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
